query:
SELECT p.id
                FROM project p
                JOIN project_group_member pgm ON pgm.group_id = p.project_group_id
                WHERE p.id = $1
                AND (
                    pgm.character_id = $2 OR
                    p.owner = $2
                )
                AND (
                    pgm.projects = 'WRITE' OR
                    pgm.projects = 'READ'
                )
